概述   软件包  类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个软件包   下一个软件包 框架    无框架    

软件包 org.opengoss.web.service

REST style web service.

请参见：
          描述

接口摘要
IAliasChangeListener Listener for alias change of domain object class.
IMarshaller Representation marshaller.
IMarshallerRegistry Marshaller registry.
IWSContainer Web servicelet container.
IWServicelet Web servicelet is a bridge between servlet and web service object.
IWSExporter Web service exporter.
 

类摘要
AbstractMarshaller Abstract represetation marshaller.
URIMatcher URI matcher.
URIPattern URI pattern to match URI path.
WebServiceServlet Servlet to export REST style web services.
 

异常摘要
WServiceException Web service exception.
 

软件包 org.opengoss.web.service 的描述

REST style web service. Support accessing java service object by serialized java object/HTTP, XML/HTTP or JSON/HTTP.

概述   软件包  类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助
